text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (General Practitioner Service and 
Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (Section 4) (Commencement) 
Order 2023.

title: 7(3) of the Health (General Practitioner Service and Alteration of Criteria for
heading: 2. The 11th day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 4
text_raw:
2. The 11th day of August 2023 is appointed as the day on which section 4 
of the Health (General Practitioner Service and Alteration of Criteria for 
Eligibility) Act 2020 (No. 11 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

The Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform consents to the making of the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 August, 2023. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 

Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Health, 

10 August, 2023. 

DEREK TIERNEY, 

A person authorised under section 15 of the Ministers and 
Secretaries Act 1924 to authenticate the seal of the 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 11th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [401] 3

title: 7(3) of the Health (General Practitioner Service and Alteration of Criteria for
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order gives effect to section 4 of the Health (General Practitioner Service 
and Alteration of Criteria for Eligibility) Act 2020 (No. 11 of 2020), from the 
11th August 2023, to allow for the provision of a general practitioner medical 
and surgical service for children under 8 years of age. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [401]
